about_the_game:
Contents
This content adds three (3) Character Edit Vouchers to Monster Hunter Wilds.

Character Edit Vouchers let you redo your character creation and debut a new look when hunting!

Select a voucher from the Save Data Selection Screen to change the appearance and voice of an existing Hunter.

*This add-on content can only be obtained once.
*Each voucher is consumed upon saving the edited character.
*You can edit hair, eyebrow color, facial hair, makeup and clothing from the Appearance Menu in tent without using a voucher.
*You may need to update to the latest version of the game to use this content.
detailed_description:
Contents
This content adds three (3) Character Edit Vouchers to Monster Hunter Wilds.

Character Edit Vouchers let you redo your character creation and debut a new look when hunting!

Select a voucher from the Save Data Selection Screen to change the appearance and voice of an existing Hunter.

*This add-on content can only be obtained once.
*Each voucher is consumed upon saving the edited character.
*You can edit hair, eyebrow color, facial hair, makeup and clothing from the Appearance Menu in tent without using a voucher.
*You may need to update to the latest version of the game to use this content.
